title: What role does music play in the current society? - Quora

Many people who realize this too late and refuse to cooperate are usually the ones in tomorrows headlines who die at the young age of '27'. (2+7= "9") THAT is a symbol of their doing. They 'invented' folk, disco, grunge, heavy metal, rap and whatever the hell that crap on the radio IS today. They systematically control the masses and they can 'make' you or 'break' as a music artist in a minute. Same applies to movies, politics, retail and religion. But remember opinions are like a%& holes; every one has one. Fight the good fight. peace :)
